alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:28PM CDT until June 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN TISHOMINGO AND SOUTHERN HARDIN COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pickwick Dam, or near Pickwick Landing State Park, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Walnut Grove, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Michie, Bacon Springs, Counce, Damon, Doskie, Southside, Hamburg, Pollards Mill, Bruton Branch, Childers Hill, Winn Springs, Red Sulphur Springs and Pittsburg Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
